chess

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    The Tile class represents a tile object
    Author:
    Justin Saganowski, Emily Tregelles

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String color
      Each Tile has a color, coordinates that indicate where it is on the board, and what (if any) chess piece currently occupies the tile
      boolean isOccupied
      isOccupied states if a Piece is currently on the Tile.
      int letter_rank 
      int number_rank 
      Piece occupying_piece
